title: Fitness effects of symbiotic relationships between arthropod predators: Synergy in a three‐way spider symbiosis
content:
Read the free Plain Language Summary for this article on the Journal blog.


Abstract

Symbiotic relationships shape ecological communities and often involve more than two species. Yet few experimental studies examine the impact of symbioses involving three species, particularly any mediating role of third parties, and none involving symbioses of predators. We investigated experimentally the synergistic and antagonistic fitness effects of three symbiotic spider predators across a broad latitudinal range and involving different species combinations. The three-dimensional web complex of Cyrtophora spiders is a habitat patch to different associates—species of Argyrodes and web-building Leucauge spider guests. Our field experiments, which manipulated the presence of each guest species and determined the subsequent host weight change, revealed a remarkable consistency in fitness outcomes across the three populations, with the consequences of the interactions between two species depending upon the services provided by a third. Cyrtophora hosts intercepted more prey when web-building Leucauge guests were present and thus gained more weight. In contrast, Argyrodes guests exerted a fitness cost on their Cyrtophora host, but only when Leucauge guests were absent. A comparison of the prey consumed by Cyrtophora hosts and Argyrodes guests revealed that their diets (reflected in the size of prey) overlapped less in the presence of Leucauge web-building guests. Our novel experimental study highlights the importance of exploring synergistic effects in multi-species symbioses.

抽象的

大多數共生關係由超過兩個物種所組成，而這對形成生態群落至關重要。至今，關於三個物種共生的研究相對罕見，尤其是對第三者調節作用的探討極少，且大多數研究未聚焦於多種無脊椎生物捕食者之間的共生系統。 我們進行了田野實驗，跨越了廣泛的緯度範圍，並使用不同物種組合，以探究三種共生蜘蛛捕食者之間的協同和對立作用。 雲斑蛛宿主的立體網是寄居姬蛛和結網型銀腹蛛的棲息地區塊。我們的野外實驗操縱了寄居姬蛛和結網型銀腹蛛的存在，並觀察到雲斑蛛宿和寄居姬蛛之間的交互作用，是如何取決於第三方物種 - 結網型銀腹蛛提供的服務。這樣的結果，在三個不同物種組合，涵蓋廣泛緯度範圍的族群中都得到了驗證。 當結網型銀腹蛛存在時，雲斑蛛宿主能夠截獲更多的獵物並增加體重。相反地，當移除結網型銀腹蛛時，寄居姬蛛對雲斑蛛宿主的適存度造成了負面影響。進一步比較雲斑蛛宿主和寄居姬蛛在取食時的偏好獵物大小，發現在結網型銀腹蛛存在時，它們的食物選擇有較少的重疊。 我們的研究結果凸顯了在多物種共生關係中探討協同效應的重要性。
